text:
The Malay Receptionist has the worst attitude.  Not helpful to visitors who are not familiar to the building. Impatient and yelling to the visitors.

My first time to visit exxxmobile and this is really a bad first impression towards this company.
The Bt Timah Esso station needs better management for the car wash.  Only one worker washing cars this morning, and a long waiting line of cars.

I wish to make enquiry on Exxon product but very difficult to look for the salesperson in Exxon Singapore.   I left my email and telephone no to the receptionist but so far nobody from sales reply to me.
